name: Skull Wings
description:
Skull Wings

This is my first 2D first person shooter game. This game is made to submit to

GMTK Game Jam 2022

Bugs

Press [Right Mouse Button] to reload. Keyboard input for HTML version currently does not work.

Software used

Godot 3.4 stable

Photopea

jsfxr - 8 bit sound maker and online sfx generator
